name: CO-OP Tanks
description:
CO-OP Tanks is game where there is no real co-op, but only rivalry between other players in up to 4 players battles on various maps, where your only goal is to push off the edge other players and survive.

Main features
  • Involving PVP battles with up to 4 players
  • 3 diffrent maps
  • Local multiplayer
  • Pizza
Controlls
  • Player 1 : w,a,s,d
  • Player 2: 'arrows'
  • Player 3: i,j,k,l
  • Player 4: 8,4,5,6 (prefere to play on numeric)
If you like the game...

If you like the game i made, you can write a comment down below, or record a youtube video ;>
